incidents.name: Error 53113 “Room Exists” When Creating Video Rooms via API

incident_updates.body: A subset of customers might receive 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. As a workaround, customers can create rooms with different names. Our engineers implemented temporary measures to make this issue less frequent until a permanent solution is created. We will provide another update in 72 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some customers might receive 53113 - “Room exists” error when creating video rooms via API, if rooms with the same name were previously created. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Video Recording Compositions Staled in Enqueued Status

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Programmable Video was degraded for 26 minutes between 15:43:49 and 15:59:49 PDT on March 13th, 2023. During this period 1.8% video compositions failed to be processed and 50 Accounts were impacted. Video compositions that get stuck in Enqueued status were manually changed to Failed status. Customers that were impacted should re-submit the compositions requests again. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with video compositions. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Super SIM Network Connectivity Issues

incident_updates.body: Super SIM network connectivity issues have been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

[Since 06:15 UTC] We are investigating an issue affecting less than 5% of devices using Super SIM, which may result in delays when connecting to the network. Devices with an existing data connection are not impacted; however, they may experience delays if they attempt to re-establish the data connection. Our engineering team is actively collaborating with the affected network provider to resolve this issue. We will provide a further update within 2 hours or sooner, as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to US Cellular Network in the US over Toll Free number

incident_updates.body: SMS Delivery Failure to US Cellular Network in the US over Toll Free numbers was degraded from 20:58 UTC to 21:24 UTC Time on 03/14/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced failures sending messages towards US Cellular Network over Toll Free number. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delays to US Cellular Network in the US over Toll Free number. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Studio Workflows Not Progressing as Expected

incident_updates.body: Studio was degraded for 2 hours and 15 minutes between 22:30 Pacific Time on 03/08/2023 and 00:45 Pacific Time on 03/09/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced Studio workflows not progressing as expected. The issue has now been resolved.
